title: Ticket #6534: Remove unused token types from the classad lexer
description: The classad lexer has support for a couple of token types that are never created or used at all: LEX_ABSOLUTE_TIME_VALUE and LEX_RELATIVE_TIME_VALUE. These take up 24 bytes of space in the TokenValue object, and are frequently copied. Let's get rid of them.
check_ins: 2018-Jan-17 15:18   Check-in [53152]: Remove unused LEX_RELATIVE_TIME_VLAUE and LEX_ABSOLUTE_TIME_VALUE #6534 These weren't used anywhere, but bloated out the TokenValue class (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
